Corn fritter.description: Corn fritters are a deep-fried snack or appetizer made from a batter of cornmeal, eggs, and milk. They are often seasoned with herbs, spices, and cheese. Corn fritters are a good source of carbohydrates and protein, but they are also high in fat and calories. They are often served as a side dish or as part of a brunch or lunch meal.

Vinegar.description: Vinegar is a sour liquid that is made by fermenting alcoholic liquids, such as wine, cider, or malt. It is often used as a condiment, a marinade, and a pickling agent. Vinegar is a good source of acetic acid, which has been shown to have some health benefits, such as reducing cholesterol levels and helping to control blood sugar. However, vinegar can also be acidic, so it is important to use it in moderation.

Butter.description: Butter is a dairy product made by churning fresh or fermented cream or milk. It is a rich source of saturated fat, but it also contains some vitamins and minerals, such as vitamin A and vitamin E. Butter can be used in cooking, baking, and as a spread. It is important to consume butter in moderation because it is high in calories and saturated fat.

Cheese,blue.description: Blue cheese is a type of cheese that is characterized by its strong, pungent flavor and its blue-green veins. It is made from cow's milk and is often aged for several months. Blue cheese is a good source of calcium and protein, but it is also high in fat and sodium. It is often served as a snack, an appetizer, or as part of a salad or pasta dish. It can also be used to make dips, sauces, and dressings.

Cheese,brick.description: Brick cheese is a semi-hard cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, slightly sweet flavor and a smooth texture. Brick cheese is often used in sandwiches, salads, and grilled cheese. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,brie.description: Brie is a soft, creamy cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, buttery flavor and a smooth, spreadable texture. Brie is often served as an appetizer, with crackers or bread. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,camembert.description: Camembert is a soft, creamy cheese that is similar to brie. It is typically made from cow's milk and is aged for several weeks. Camembert has a stronger, more pungent flavor than brie. It is often served as an appetizer, with crackers or bread. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,caraway.description: Caraway cheese is a semi-hard cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, nutty flavor and a smooth texture. Caraway cheese is often used in sandwiches and salads. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,cheshire.description: Cheshire cheese is a hard, crumbly cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a sharp, slightly salty flavor. Cheshire cheese is often used in sandwiches, salads, and grilled cheese. It can also be grated and used in dishes such as pasta and pizza.

Cheese,colby.description: Colby cheese is a semi-hard cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, slightly sweet flavor and a smooth texture. Colby cheese is often used in sandwiches, salads, and grilled cheese. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,cream.description: Cream cheese is a soft, spreadable cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, buttery flavor and a smooth, creamy texture. Cheese,edam.description: Edam cheese is a semi-hard cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, nutty flavor and a smooth texture. Edam cheese is often used in sandwiches and salads. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,fontina.description: Fontina cheese is a semi-hard cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, nutty flavor and a smooth texture. Fontina cheese is often used in sandwiches, salads, and pasta dishes. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,gjetost.description: Gjetost is a sweet, caramel-colored cheese that is typically made from goat's milk. It has a rich, creamy flavor and a smooth texture. Gjetost is often served as a dessert, with crackers or bread. It can also be used in baking.

Cheese,gruyere.description: Gruyere cheese is a hard, nutty cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a slightly sweet flavor and a smooth texture. Gruyere cheese is often used in sandwiches, salads, and fondue. It can also be grated and used in dishes such as pasta and pizza.

Cheese,limburger.description: Limburger cheese is a soft, pungent cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a strong, earthy flavor and a smooth texture. Limburger cheese is often served as an appetizer, with crackers or bread. It can also be used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,neufchatel.description: Neufchatel cheese is a soft, creamy cheese that is similar to cream cheese. It is typically made from cow's milk and is aged for several weeks. Cheese,port-salut.description: Port-Salut cheese is a semi-soft cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, nutty flavor and a smooth texture. Port-Salut cheese is often served as an appetizer, with crackers or bread. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,ricotta.description: Ricotta cheese is a soft, fresh cheese that is typically made from whey, the liquid that is left over from the cheesemaking process. Cheese,romano.description: Romano cheese is a hard, granular cheese that is typically made from sheep's milk. It has a sharp, salty flavor and a crumbly texture. Romano cheese is often used as a topping for pasta dishes, salads, and pizza. It can also be grated and used in dishes such as soups and sauces.

Cheese,tilsit.description: Tilsit cheese is a semi-hard cheese that is typically made from cow's milk. It has a mild, slightly sweet flavor and a smooth texture. Tilsit cheese is often used in sandwiches and salads. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces.

Cheese,processed.description: Processed cheese is a type of cheese that has been melted and mixed with other ingredients, such as milk, butter, and emulsifiers. It has a smoother, more uniform texture than natural cheese. Processed cheese is often used in sandwiches, salads, and grilled cheese. It can also be melted and used in dips and sauces. Eggnog.description: Eggnog is a rich, creamy drink that is typically made from milk, eggs, sugar, and spices. It is often served during the holiday season. Eggnog is a good source of calcium and protein, but it is also high in calories and fat. It is important to consume eggnog in moderation.

Milk.description: Milk is a nutrient-rich beverage that is produced by mammals. It is a good source of calcium, vitamin D, and protein. Milk is often consumed as a beverage, but it can also be used in cooking and baking. There are many different types of milk available, including cow's milk, almond milk, soy milk, and oat milk. Milk provides a good source of nutrients for many people, but some people are lactose intolerant and unable to digest milk.

Whey.description: Whey is a milk protein that is a by-product of cheesemaking. It is a good source of protein and other nutrients. Whey is often used in protein shakes and supplements. It is often used in protein powders and bars for an added protein boost.

Egg.description: Eggs are a nutrient-rich food that is a good source of protein, vitamins, and minerals. Eggs are often consumed as part of breakfast, but they can also be used in cooking and baking. Eggs are a versatile ingredient and can be used in a variety of dishes.

Cheese fondue.description: Cheese fondue is a dish that is made by melting cheese in a pot and dipping bread, vegetables, and other foods into it. It is a popular appetizer or snack. It is usually served with a side of bread and potatoes. It is often served with a side of bread and potatoes.

Cheese sauce.description: Cheese sauce is a creamy sauce that is made by melting cheese in milk or cream. It is often used as a topping for pasta dishes, vegetables, and other foods. Cheese sauce is a good source of calcium and protein, but it is also high in fat and calories.

Basil.description: Basil is an herb that is characterized by its sweet, slightly peppery flavor. It is often used in Italian dishes, such as pasta sauces and pizzas. Salt.description: Salt is a mineral that is essential for human health. It is used to flavor food and to preserve it. Salt is also used in many industrial processes. While essential for human health, too much salt can be harmful. It can contribute to high blood pressure and other health problems. The recommended daily intake of salt is less than 2,300 milligrams.

Thyme.description: Thyme is an herb that is characterized by its pungent, slightly sweet flavor. It is often used in soups, stews, and sauces. It is often paired with other herbs, such as rosemary and oregano.

Animal fat.description: Animal fat is a type of fat that is derived from animals. It is a rich source of saturated fat, but it also contains some vitamins and minerals. Salad dressing.description: Salad dressing is a product that is added to salads to make them more flavorful and appealing. It is typically made from oil, vinegar, herbs, and spices. It can also be added to foods, such as smoothies and yogurt. However, it is important to note that fish oil is not a substitute for eating a healthy diet.

Chicken.description: Chicken is a type of poultry that is a good source of protein, vitamins, and minerals. Cheese,muenster.description: Muenster cheese is a semi-hard cheese with a mild, buttery flavor. It is often used in sandwiches, salads, and grilled cheese. Muenster cheese can also be smoked, which gives it a more intense flavor.

Bread stuffing.description: Bread stuffing is a type of stuffing made from bread, vegetables, and often sausage or other meat. It is a popular side dish for Thanksgiving and other holiday meals. Bread stuffing can be cooked in the oven or in a slow cooker.

Cake.description: Cake is a sweet baked good that is typically made from flour, sugar, eggs, butter, and milk. It is often decorated with frosting, icing, or fruit. Cake is a popular dessert and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Cheesecake.description: Cheesecake is a dessert made from a cream cheese base that is often baked on a crust. It can be topped with fruit, chocolate, or other toppings. Cheesecake is a rich and decadent dessert that is often enjoyed for special occasions.

Cookie.description: A cookie is a sweet baked good that is typically small and made from flour, sugar, butter, and eggs. Cookies can be plain or decorated with chocolate chips, nuts, or other ingredients. Cookies are a popular snack or dessert and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Cracker.description: Crackers are a type of thin, crisp, baked bread product. They are often made from flour, water, and salt. Crackers are a popular snack and can be enjoyed on their own or with cheese, dips, or other toppings. Crackers can also be used in salads or as a base for appetizers.

Cracker meal.description: Cracker meal is a type of finely ground cracker that is used as a coating for fried foods or as a thickener for soups and sauces.

Cream puff.description: A cream puff is a light and airy pastry made from choux pastry, which is a dough made from flour, butter, eggs, and water. The pastry is piped into small mounds and baked until golden brown. Cream puffs are often filled with whipped cream, custard, or ice cream.

Croissant.description: A croissant is a flaky, buttery pastry made from puff pastry. Croissants are often served for breakfast, but they can also be enjoyed as a snack or dessert. They can be plain or filled with chocolate, fruit, or other ingredients.

Croutons.description: Croutons are small, toasted pieces of bread that are often used as a topping for salads or soups. They can be made from white bread, wheat bread, or other types of bread. Croutons are a good source of carbohydrates and can add a bit of crunch to salads or soups.

Danish pastry.description: Danish pastries are a type of sweet pastry that is typically made from puff pastry. Danish pastries are often filled with fruit, cheese, or other sweet ingredients. They are a popular breakfast or dessert food and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Doughnut.description: A doughnut is a fried or baked pastry that is typically ring-shaped or ball-shaped. Doughnuts are often covered in glaze, frosting, or sprinkles. Doughnuts are a popular snack or dessert and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

English muffin.description: An English muffin is a small, round bread that is typically made from flour, water, and yeast. English muffins are often split in half and toasted before being served with butter, jam, or other toppings. They are a popular breakfast food and can also be used in sandwiches or other recipes.

French toast.description: French toast is a breakfast dish made from bread that is soaked in a mixture of eggs, milk, and often spices. It is then pan-fried until golden brown. French toast is often served with syrup, fruit, or powdered sugar. It is a sweet and satisfying breakfast option.

Hush puppy.description: A hush puppy is a small, fried ball of cornmeal batter. Hush puppies are often served as a side dish with fried seafood, but they can also be enjoyed as a snack or appetizer.

Ice cream cone.description: An ice cream cone is a cone-shaped pastry that is typically filled with ice cream. Ice cream cones are a popular summer treat and can be enjoyed with a variety of ice cream flavors.

Muffin.description: A muffin is a small, cup-shaped baked good that is typically made from flour, sugar, eggs, and butter. Muffins can be plain or flavored with chocolate chips, fruit, or other ingredients. Muffins are a popular breakfast or snack food and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Pancake.description: A pancake is a flat, thin cake that is typically made from flour, eggs, and milk. Pancakes are often served for breakfast, but they can also be enjoyed for lunch or dinner. They can be plain or topped with syrup, fruit, or other ingredients.

Pie.description: A pie is a baked dish that typically consists of a crust filled with a sweet or savory filling. Pie crusts are often made from flour, butter, and water. Pie fillings can be made from fruit, vegetables, meat, or cheese. Pies are a popular dessert or main course and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Pie crust.description: Pie crust is a type of pastry dough that is used to make the crust of a pie. It is typically made from flour, butter, and water. Pie crusts can be made in a variety of ways, such as by hand, in a food processor, or by using a rolling pin. Pie crusts can be baked with a filling or used to make a tart shell.

Phyllo dough.description: Phyllo dough is a thin, flaky pastry dough that is often used to make baklava, spanakopita, and other pastries. It is made from flour, water, and sometimes oil. Phyllo dough is very delicate and should be handled with care. It is typically layered with fillings and baked until golden brown.

Popover.description: A popover is a light and airy baked good made from a batter of flour, eggs, and milk. Popovers are often served with breakfast, but they can also be enjoyed as a snack or side dish. They can be savory or sweet, depending on the ingredients and preparation.

Roll.description: A roll is a small, baked bread product that is often served with meals. Rolls can be made from a variety of doughs, including yeast dough, quick bread dough, and biscuit dough. They can be plain or flavored with seeds, grains, or other ingredients.

Strudel.description: Strudel is a type of pastry that is typically made from phyllo dough. Strudel is often filled with fruit, cheese, or other sweet or savory ingredients. It is then baked until golden brown. Strudel is a popular dessert or main course and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Sweet roll.description: A sweet roll is a type of pastry that is typically made from yeast dough. Sweet rolls are often filled with fruit, cream cheese, or other sweet ingredients. They are then baked until golden brown. Sweet rolls are a popular breakfast or dessert food and can be enjoyed for special occasions or as a treat.

Taco shell.description: A taco shell is a crispy, cone-shaped shell that is typically made from corn tortillas. Taco shells are often used to make tacos. They can be filled with meat, cheese, vegetables, and other toppings. Taco shells are a popular Mexican and Latin American dish and can be enjoyed for lunch or dinner.

Toaster pastry.description: A toaster pastry is a type of pastry that is typically made from a flaky dough that is filled with a sweet filling. Toaster pastries are often baked and then frozen. They are typically reheated in a toaster or oven before being served. Toaster pastries are a popular breakfast or snack food.

Tortilla.description: A tortilla is a flatbread that is typically made from corn or wheat flour. Tortillas are a staple food in Mexican and Latin American cuisine. They are often used to make tacos, burritos, enchiladas, and other dishes. Tortillas can be eaten plain or used as a wrap for other foods.

Waffle.description: A waffle is a grid-shaped baked good that is typically made from batter. Waffles are often served for breakfast, but they can also be enjoyed for lunch or dinner. They can be plain or topped with syrup, fruit, or other ingredients.

Wonton wrapper (egg roll wrapper).description: Wonton wrappers, also known as egg roll wrappers, are thin, square sheets of dough that are typically made from wheat flour and water. They are used to make wontons, egg rolls, and other dishes. Wonton wrappers can be boiled, fried, or baked. They are often filled with meat, vegetables, or cheese.

Leavening agent.description: Leavening agents are ingredients that cause baked goods to rise. They work by producing carbon dioxide gas, which creates bubbles in the dough. Common leavening agents include baking powder, baking soda, and yeast.

Puff pastry.description: Puff pastry is a flaky pastry dough that is made by layering butter and dough. The layers of butter create steam during baking, which causes the pastry to puff up and become flaky. Puff pastry is often used to make croissants, strudel, and other pastries.

Sea Lion.description: Sea lion meat is a source of protein and fat, traditionally consumed in some coastal cultures. It has a rich, gamey flavor and can be cooked in various ways, including grilling, roasting, and stewing. Sea lion hunting is regulated and may be subject to cultural or environmental considerations.

Rice bran.description: Rice bran is the outer layer of the rice grain. It is a good source of fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Rice bran can be eaten raw, cooked, or used as a food additive. It is often used as a coating for foods or as a thickener for soups and sauces.

Salad dressing,russian.description: Russian dressing is a creamy salad dressing that typically contains mayonnaise, ketchup, and sometimes pickle relish. It is often served with salads, sandwiches, and dips.

Salad dressing,thousand island.description: Thousand Island dressing is a creamy salad dressing that typically contains mayonnaise, ketchup, chopped sweet pickles, and sometimes other ingredients. It is often served with salads and sandwiches.

Salad dressing,mayonnaise type.description: Mayonnaise-type salad dressings are a category of salad dressings that are typically made with mayonnaise as a base. They often contain other ingredients, such as vinegar, lemon juice, herbs, and spices. Mayonnaise-type salad dressings are often served with salads and sandwiches.

Salad dressing,french.description: French dressing is a vinaigrette-type salad dressing that typically contains oil, vinegar, herbs, and spices. It is often served with salads.

Salad dressing,italian.description: Italian dressing is a vinaigrette-type salad dressing that typically contains oil, vinegar, herbs, and spices. It is often served with salads.

Salad dressing,mayonnaise.description: Mayonnaise is a creamy emulsion of oil, egg yolks, and vinegar or lemon juice. It is often used as a salad dressing, a sandwich spread, and a base for other sauces and dips.

Salad dressing,blue cheese.description: Blue cheese dressing is a creamy salad dressing that typically contains mayonnaise, blue cheese, and sometimes other ingredients, such as sour cream or buttermilk. It is often served with salads and sandwiches.

Animal fat,native.description: Native animal fat is a type of fat that is extracted from animals, such as beef, pork, or lamb. It is often used in cooking, especially in traditional cuisines. Native animal fat is high in saturated fat and cholesterol, so it should be consumed in moderation.

Shortening,industrial.description: Industrial shortening is a type of fat that is made from vegetable oils. It is solid at room temperature and is often used in baking and frying. Industrial shortening is typically hydrogenated, which means that it has been chemically altered to make it more solid. Hydrogenated fats can raise cholesterol levels, so they should be consumed in moderation.

Chicken,giblets.description: Chicken giblets are the edible internal organs of a chicken, including the heart, liver, and gizzards. They are a good source of protein and iron. Chicken giblets can be cooked and used in soups, stews, and other dishes.

Chicken,gizzard.description: Chicken gizzards are the muscular stomach of a chicken. They are a tough but flavorful part of the chicken. Chicken gizzards can be cooked and used in soups, stews, and other dishes. They can also be ground and used as a filling for sausages.

Chicken,heart.description: Chicken hearts are the muscular heart of a chicken. They are a good source of protein and iron. Chicken hearts can be cooked and used in soups, stews, and other dishes.

Chicken,liver.description: Chicken livers are the liver of a chicken. They are a good source of protein, iron, and vitamin A. Chicken livers can be cooked and used in pâté, terrines, and other dishes.

Chicken,light meat.description: Chicken light meat refers to the white meat of a chicken, such as the breast and wings. Light meat is generally leaner and has a milder flavor than dark meat. It is often used in salads, sandwiches, and stir-fries.

Chicken,dark meat.description: Chicken dark meat refers to the darker meat of a chicken, such as the legs and thighs. Dark meat is richer in flavor and contains more fat than light meat. It is often used in stews, casseroles, and other dishes.

Chicken,back.description: Chicken back is the backbone of a chicken. It is a bony part of the chicken that is often used to make chicken stock or broth. Chicken back can also be added to stews and other dishes for added flavor.

Chicken,breast.description: Chicken breast is the most popular part of the chicken. It is a lean and flavorful part of the chicken that is often used in salads, sandwiches, and stir-fries. Chicken breast can be cooked in a variety of ways, such as grilling, baking, or frying.

Chicken,drumstick.description: Chicken drumstick is the lower leg of a chicken. It is a darker meat that is rich in flavor and contains more fat than light meat. Chicken drumsticks are often roasted or fried.

Chicken,leg.description: Chicken leg is the entire lower leg of a chicken, including the drumstick and thigh. It is a darker meat that is rich in flavor and contains more fat than light meat. Chicken legs are often roasted or fried.

Chicken,neck.description: Chicken neck is the neck of a chicken. It is a bony part of the chicken that is often used to make chicken stock or broth. Chicken neck can also be added to stews and other dishes for added flavor.

Chicken,thigh.description: Chicken thigh is the upper leg of a chicken. It is a darker meat that is rich in flavor and contains more fat than light meat. Chicken thighs are often roasted or fried. They can also be cooked in a variety of other ways, such as grilling or baking.

Chicken,wing.description: Chicken wing is the wing of a chicken. It is a smaller, darker meat that is often used in appetizers or as a snack. Chicken wings are typically fried or baked and often served with a dipping sauce.

Chicken,cornish game hens.description: Cornish game hens are a type of small chicken that is bred for its meat. They are typically roasted whole and served as a main course. Cornish game hens are flavorful and tender, and they have a higher fat content than regular chickens.

Chicken,ground.description: Ground chicken is a type of chicken meat that has been ground into a fine mixture. It is a lean and versatile meat that can be used in a variety of dishes, such as burgers, meatballs, and chili. Ground chicken is often used as a substitute for ground beef.

Duck,domesticated.description: Domesticated duck is a type of duck that is raised for its meat. It is a rich and flavorful meat with a higher fat content than chicken. Squab.description: Squab is the young of a pigeon or dove that is raised for its meat. It has a tender, flavorful meat that is often served as a delicacy. Squab can be cooked in a variety of ways, such as roasting, grilling, and braising.

Soup,clam chowder.description: Clam chowder is a hearty soup made from clams, potatoes, milk, and other ingredients, such as onions, celery, and bacon. It is a popular dish in New England and is often served as a main course. Clam chowder can be made with a white or a red base, depending on the recipe.

Soup,Italian wedding.description: Italian wedding soup is a light and flavorful soup made from chicken broth, vegetables, and small pasta dumplings. It is often served as a starter or as a light meal. Italian wedding soup is known for its savory flavor and its delicate texture.

Soup,tomato noodle.description: Tomato noodle soup is a hearty soup made from tomatoes, noodles, broth, and other ingredients, such as vegetables and seasonings. It is a good source of nutrients and is often served as a comfort food or as a light meal. Tomato noodle soup is known for its sweet and tangy flavor and its bright red color.

Soup,wonton.description: Wonton soup is a type of Chinese noodle soup that is made from wontons, broth, and other ingredients, such as vegetables, meat, and eggs. It is a popular dish in China and is often served as a main course. Wonton soup is known for its savory flavor and its delicate wontons.

Soup,cream,broccoli.description: Cream of broccoli soup is a creamy soup made from broccoli, broth, and other ingredients, such as cream, butter, and seasonings. It is a rich and flavorful soup that is often served as a starter or as a light meal. Cream of broccoli soup is known for its creamy texture and its bright green color.

Soup (sauce),stock,cream.description: Cream stock is a type of broth that is made with cream. It is often used as a base for soups and sauces. Cream stock is known for its rich, creamy flavor.

Sauce,Stroganoff.description: Stroganoff sauce is a creamy sauce made from sour cream, mushrooms, and often other ingredients, such as onions, garlic, and paprika. It is often served with beef, chicken, or noodles. Stroganoff sauce is known for its rich, savory flavor and its creamy texture.

Sauce,teriyaki.description: Teriyaki sauce is a sweet and savory sauce made from soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and sometimes other ingredients, such as ginger, garlic, and sesame oil. It is often used to glaze meat and fish. Teriyaki sauce is known for its sweet and savory flavor and its glossy glaze.

Sauce,barbecue.description: Barbecue sauce is a sweet and smoky sauce that is typically made from tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and spices. It is often used to baste and glaze meats during grilling or smoking. Barbecue sauce can vary widely in its flavor and consistency, depending on the recipe.

Sauce,salsa.description: Salsa is a spicy sauce made from tomatoes, onions, peppers, and other ingredients. It is often served with Mexican and Latin American food. Salsa can vary widely in its flavor and consistency, depending on the recipe.

Sauce,white.description: White sauce is a creamy sauce made from butter, flour, and milk. It is often used as a base for other sauces and soups. White sauce is known for its smooth, creamy texture and its mild flavor.

Sauce,pepper.description: Pepper sauce is a spicy sauce made from peppers. It is often used to add a kick to dishes. Pepper sauce can vary widely in its heat level, depending on the type of pepper used.

Sauce,steak.description: Steak sauce is a savory sauce that is typically made from tomatoes, vinegar, spices, and sometimes other ingredients, such as Worcestershire sauce. It is often served with steak. Steak sauce can vary widely in its flavor and consistency, depending on the recipe.

Sauce,tartar.description: Tartar sauce is a creamy sauce made from mayonnaise, chopped pickles, capers, and sometimes other ingredients, such as onions, garlic, and herbs. It is often served with seafood. Tartar sauce is known for its tangy flavor and its creamy texture.

Sauce,worcestershire.description: Worcestershire sauce is a savory sauce made from fermented anchovies, vinegar, sugar, and spices. It is often used as a condiment or as an ingredient in sauces and marinades. Worcestershire sauce has a complex flavor that is both sweet and savory.

Sauce,mustard.description: Mustard sauce is a sauce made from mustard seeds. It is often used as a condiment or as an ingredient in sauces and marinades. Mustard sauce can vary widely in its flavor and consistency, depending on the type of mustard seeds used.

Sauce,oyster.description: Oyster sauce is a savory sauce made from oysters, sugar, salt, and sometimes other ingredients, such as soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Sauce,cheese.description: Cheese sauce is a creamy sauce made from cheese, milk, and sometimes other ingredients, such as butter, flour, and seasonings. It is often served with pasta, vegetables, and meat. Cheese sauce is known for its rich, cheesy flavor and its smooth, creamy texture.

Sauce,pasta.description: Pasta sauce is a type of sauce that is typically served with pasta. It can be made with a variety of ingredients, such as tomatoes, meat, vegetables, and herbs. Pasta sauce can vary widely in its flavor and consistency, depending on the recipe.

Sauce,cocktail.description: Cocktail sauce is a spicy sauce that is typically made from ketchup, horseradish, and sometimes other ingredients, such as lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and hot sauce. It is often served with seafood. Cocktail sauce is known for its tangy flavor and its spicy kick.

Sauce,adobo fresco.description: Adobo fresco is a Mexican sauce made from tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and chili peppers. It is often served with tacos, enchiladas, and other Mexican dishes. Adobo fresco is known for its fresh, vibrant flavor and its spicy kick.

Sausage,Beerwurst.description: Beerwurst is a type of German sausage that is made with pork, beef, and beer. It is often served grilled or fried. Beerwurst is known for its mild, slightly sweet flavor.

Sausage,Brotwurst.description: Brotwurst is a type of German sausage that is made with pork and bread crumbs. It is often served grilled or fried. Brotwurst is known for its savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,thuringer.description: Thuringer sausage is a type of German sausage that is made with pork, beef, and spices. It is often served grilled or fried. Thuringer sausage is known for its savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,Bratwurst.description: Bratwurst is a type of German sausage that is made with pork and spices. It is often served grilled or fried. Bratwurst is known for its savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,Braunschweiger.description: Braunschweiger is a type of liverwurst that is made from pork liver. It is often served spread on bread or crackers. Braunschweiger is known for its rich, savory flavor and its smooth texture.

Breakfast sausage can be cooked in a variety of ways, such as frying, grilling, or baking. It is often served with eggs, pancakes, or waffles.

Sausage,salami.description: Salami is a type of cured sausage that is made from pork, beef, or other meats. It is often seasoned with spices and fermented. Salami is typically sliced and served cold. It is often used in sandwiches or salads. Salami is known for its savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,kielbasa.description: Kielbasa is a type of Polish sausage that is typically made from pork, beef, and spices. It is often served grilled or fried. Kielbasa is known for its savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,chorizo.description: Chorizo is a type of Spanish sausage that is typically made from pork and spices. It is often served grilled, fried, or in pasta dishes. Sausage,Oktoberfest.description: Oktoberfest sausage is a type of German sausage that is typically made from pork, beef, and spices. It is often served grilled or fried. Oktoberfest sausage is known for its savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,Merguez.description: Merguez sausage is a type of North African sausage that is typically made from lamb, beef, and spices. It is often served grilled or fried. Merguez sausage is known for its savory flavor and its slightly spicy kick.

Sausage,honey garlic.description: Honey garlic sausage is a type of sausage that is flavored with honey and garlic. It is often served grilled or fried. Honey garlic sausage is known for its sweet and savory flavor and its slightly chewy texture.

Sausage,spicy beef.description: Spicy beef sausage is a type of sausage that is made with beef and spices. It is often served grilled or fried. Spicy beef sausage is known for its savory flavor and its spicy kick.

Cereal,ready to eat.description: Ready-to-eat cereal is a type of breakfast cereal that is typically eaten cold with milk or yogurt. It is often made from grains, sugar, and other ingredients. Ready-to-eat cereal is a convenient and popular breakfast option. However, many varieties are high in sugar and low in fiber.

Cereal,hot.description: Hot cereal is a type of breakfast cereal that is typically cooked in water or milk. It is often made from grains, such as oatmeal, grits, or cream of wheat. Hot cereal is a healthy and filling breakfast option. It is a good source of fiber and can help to keep you feeling full for longer.

Acerola.description: Acerola, also known as Barbados cherry, is a small, tart fruit that is a good source of vitamin C. It is often eaten raw or used to make juice or jams. Acerola is native to the Caribbean and is known for its high concentration of vitamin C, which is important for immune health and collagen production.

Apple.description: An apple is a sweet and crisp fruit that is a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and potassium. It can be eaten raw, cooked, or used to make juice, cider, or pies. Apples are a versatile fruit that can be enjoyed in many different ways.

Apricot.description: An apricot is a sweet and juicy fruit that is a good source of fiber, vitamin A, and potassium. It can be eaten raw, dried, or used to make jams, preserves, or pies. Apricots are a good source of antioxidants and are known for their vibrant orange color.

Avocado.description: An avocado is a creamy and buttery fruit that is a good source of healthy fats, fiber, and potassium. It can be eaten raw, mashed, or used in salads, dips, or smoothies. Avocados are a good source of heart-healthy monounsaturated fats and are known for their creamy texture and rich flavor.

Banana.description: A banana is a sweet and soft fruit that is a good source of potassium, fiber, and vitamin B6. It can be eaten raw, cooked, or used in smoothies or baked goods. Bananas are a good source of potassium, which is important for muscle function and blood pressure regulation.

Blackberry.description: A blackberry is a sweet and tart fruit that is a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and manganese. It can be eaten raw, used to make jams or pies, or added to smoothies or yogurt. Blackberries are a good source of antioxidants and are known for their dark purple color.

Blueberry.description: A blueberry is a sweet and tart fruit that is a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and manganese. It can be eaten raw, used to make jams or pies, or added to smoothies or yogurt. Blueberries are a good source of antioxidants and are known for their bright blue color.

Boysenberry.description: A boysenberry is a hybrid fruit that is a cross between a blackberry, raspberry, and loganberry. It has a sweet and tart flavor and is a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and manganese. Boysenberries can be eaten raw or used to make jams, pies, or other desserts.

Breadfruit.description: Breadfruit is a large, starchy fruit that is a good source of carbohydrates and fiber. It is often eaten cooked, either boiled, baked, or fried. Breadfruit is a popular food in the Caribbean and Pacific islands. It can be used as a substitute for potatoes or rice.

Carambola.description: Carambola, also known as star fruit, is a tropical fruit that has a tart and slightly sweet flavor. It is often eaten raw or used to make juice or jams. Carambola is known for its star-shaped cross-section and its slightly tart flavor.

Carissa.description: Carissa, also known as Natal plum, is a small, sweet fruit that is a good source of vitamin C. It is often eaten raw or used to make jams or preserves. Carissa is native to Africa and is known for its sweet, slightly tart flavor and its red or orange color.

Cherimoya.description: Cherimoya is a tropical fruit that has a sweet and creamy flavor. It is often eaten raw or used to make smoothies or desserts. Cherimoya is known for its custard-like texture and its sweet, slightly tangy flavor.

Crabapple.description: A crabapple is a small, tart fruit that is often used to make jams or jellies. It can also be used to make cider or vinegar. Crabapples are a good source of vitamin C and are known for their tart flavor.

Cranberry.description: A cranberry is a tart fruit that is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. It is often eaten raw or used to make juice, sauce, or relish. Cranberries are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants and are known for their bright red color.

Currant.description: A currant is a small, tart fruit that is often used to make jams, jellies, or sauces. It can also be used to make wine or juice. Currants are a good source of vitamin C and are known for their tart flavor.

Custard apple.description: Custard apple, also known as cherimoya, is a tropical fruit that has a sweet and creamy flavor. It is often eaten raw or used to make smoothies or desserts. Custard apple is known for its custard-like texture and its sweet, slightly tangy flavor.

Elderberry.description: Elderberry is a small, tart fruit that is often used to make jams, jellies, or syrups. It can also be used to make wine or juice. Elderberries are a good source of antioxidants and have been traditionally used for medicinal purposes.

Fig.description: A fig is a sweet and fleshy fruit that is a good source of fiber, calcium, and potassium. It can be eaten raw, dried, or used to make jams, preserves, or pies. Figs are known for their sweet, slightly earthy flavor and their soft, chewy texture.

Fruit cocktail.description: Fruit cocktail is a canned fruit mixture that typically contains peaches, pears, pineapple, and cherries. It is often served as a dessert or a snack. Fruit cocktail is a good source of vitamins and minerals, but it is often high in sugar.

Fruit salad.description: Fruit salad is a dish made from a variety of fruits. It is often served as a dessert or a snack. Fruit salad is a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.

Gooseberry.description: A gooseberry is a small, tart fruit that is often used to make jams, jellies, or sauces. It can also be used to make wine or juice. Gooseberries are a good source of vitamin C and are known for their tart flavor.

Grapefruit juice.description: Grapefruit juice is a juice made from grapefruits. It is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. Grapefruit juice can be enjoyed on its own or used in smoothies or cocktails.

Grape.description: A grape is a small, sweet fruit that is a good source of potassium, fiber, and vitamin K. It can be eaten raw or used to make wine, juice, or jam. Grapes are a popular fruit and are known for their sweet flavor and their juicy texture.

Guava.description: Guava is a tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor. It is rich in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. Guava can be eaten raw, juiced, or used in jams, jellies, and desserts.

Jackfruit.description: Jackfruit is a large, tropical fruit with a sweet and slightly tangy flavor. It is a good source of fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Lemon.description: Lemon is a citrus fruit with a tart and acidic flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. Lemons are often used in cooking and baking, and their juice is a popular ingredient in drinks and sauces. The zest of a lemon can also be used to add flavor to dishes.

Lime.description: Lime is a citrus fruit with a tart and acidic flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. Limes are often used in cooking and baking, and their juice is a popular ingredient in drinks and sauces. The zest of a lime can also be used to add flavor to dishes.

Lychee.description: Lychee is a tropical fruit with a sweet and floral flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. Lychees are often eaten raw or used in desserts. They are known for their translucent white flesh and their single, dark brown seed.

Prune.description: A prune is a dried plum. It is a good source of fiber, potassium, and iron. Prune are often eaten as a snack or used in baking. They are known for their sweet and chewy texture.

Prune juice.description: Prune juice is a juice made from prunes. It is a good source of fiber, potassium, and iron. Prune juice is often consumed to help with digestion. It is known for its sweet and tart flavor.

Pummelo.description: Pummelo is a large, citrus fruit that is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. It can be eaten raw or used to make juice or marmalade. Pummelo is known for its large size and its thick, white rind.

Quince.description: Quince is a fruit with a tart and slightly sweet flavor. It is often used to make jams, jellies, and desserts. Quinces are known for their hard, green exterior and their yellow or orange flesh. They are also used to make quince paste, a traditional dessert.

Raspberry.description: A raspberry is a small, sweet fruit that is a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and manganese. It can be eaten raw, used to make jams or pies, or added to smoothies or yogurt. Raspberries are known for their bright red color and their sweet, slightly tart flavor.

Rhubarb.description: Rhubarb is a vegetable that has a tart and tangy flavor. It is often used to make pies, jams, and sauces. Rhubarb is a good source of vitamin C and fiber. It is known for its tall stalks with red or green leaves. It is important to note that only the stalks of rhubarb are edible, as the leaves are poisonous.

Roselle.description: Roselle, also known as hibiscus sabdariffa, is a plant whose calyces (the sepals that surround the flower) are used to make a tart and refreshing drink. It is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. Roselle is also used to make jams, jellies, and sauces. It is known for its vibrant red color and its tart, slightly sweet flavor.

Rose-apple.description: Rose-apple, also known as wax apple, is a fruit with a sweet and slightly tart flavor. It is often eaten raw or used to make juices and salads. Rose-apples are known for their crisp texture and their light pink or red color.

Sapodilla.description: Sapodilla is a tropical fruit with a sweet and slightly nutty flavor. It is a good source of fiber and vitamins. Sapodillas are often eaten raw or used in desserts. They are known for their brown, leathery skin and their soft, brown flesh.

Sapote.description: Sapote, also known as black sapote, is a tropical fruit with a sweet and chocolate-like flavor. It is a good source of fiber and vitamins. Sapodillas are often eaten raw or used in desserts. They are known for their dark brown or black skin and their creamy, chocolate-like flesh.

Soursop.description: Soursop, also known as guanabana, is a tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants. Soursops are often eaten raw or used to make juices, smoothies, and desserts. They are known for their spiky, green skin and their creamy, white flesh.

Strawberry.description: A strawberry is a small, sweet fruit that is a good source of vitamin C, fiber, and manganese. It can be eaten raw, used to make jams or pies, or added to smoothies or yogurt. Strawberries are known for their bright red color and their sweet, slightly tart flavor.

Sugar-apple.description: Sugar-apple, also known as mammy-apple, is a tropical fruit with a sweet and creamy flavor. It is a good source of fiber and vitamins. Sugar-apples are often eaten raw or used in desserts. They are known for their spiky, green skin and their white, custard-like flesh.

Tamarind.description: Tamarind is a tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor. It is a good source of fiber, potassium, and iron. Tamarinds are often used to make juices, jams, and sauces. They are known for their brown, pod-like fruits that contain a sweet and tangy pulp.

Watermelon.description: Watermelon is a large, juicy fruit with a sweet and refreshing flavor. It is a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber. Watermelons are often eaten raw or used to make juices and smoothies. They are known for their large size and their bright red flesh.

Feijoa.description: Feijoa, also known as pineapple guava, is a fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor. It is a good source of vitamin C and fiber. Feijoas can be eaten raw or used to make jams, jellies, and desserts. They are known for their oval shape and their green or brown skin.

Pear,asian.description: Asian pear, also known as apple pear, is a fruit with a crisp and juicy texture. It has a sweet and slightly tangy flavor. Asian pears are often eaten raw or used in salads and desserts. They are known for their round shape and their yellow or green skin.

Apple juice.description: Apple juice is a juice made from apples. It is a good source of vitamin C and potassium. Apple juice can be enjoyed on its own or used in smoothies or cocktails. It is a popular breakfast drink.

Pork.description: Pork is a type of red meat that comes from pigs. It is a good source of protein, iron, and zinc. Pork can be cooked in a variety of ways, including roasting, grilling, and frying. It is often used in dishes like pork chops, pork roast, and pulled pork.

Pork,leg.description: Pork leg, also known as ham, is a large cut of meat that comes from the hind leg of a pig. It is a rich and flavorful cut of meat that is often cured and smoked. Pork leg can be cooked in a variety of ways, including roasting, grilling, and braising. It is often served as a main course.

Pork,loin.description: Pork loin is a lean and tender cut of meat that comes from the back of a pig. It is often used for roasting, grilling, or frying. Pork loin can be cooked in a variety of ways, including grilling, roasting, and frying. It is often served as a main course.

Pork,shoulder.description: Pork shoulder is a large cut of meat that comes from the shoulder of a pig. It is a tough but flavorful cut of meat that is often used for braising, slow-cooking, or making pulled pork. Pork shoulder is known for its rich flavor and its tender texture after slow-cooking.

Pork,brains.description: Pork brains are the brain of a pig. They are a delicacy in some cultures and are often cooked and served fried or braised. Pork brains are a good source of protein and iron. However, it is important to note that pork brains should be cooked properly to avoid the risk of parasites.

Pork,intestine.description: Pork intestine, also known as chitterlings, is a type of offal that is often cleaned and cooked. It is a delicacy in some cultures and is often served fried or stewed. Pork intestine is a good source of protein and iron. However, it is important to note that pork intestine should be cooked properly to avoid the risk of parasites.

Pork,ears.description: Pork ears are the ears of a pig. They are often cooked and served as a snack or appetizer. Pork ears are a good source of protein and collagen. They are typically fried or braised until tender and often served with a dipping sauce.

Pork,feet.description: Pork feet are the feet of a pig. They are often cooked and served as a snack or appetizer. Pork feet are a good source of protein and collagen. They are typically braised or stewed until tender.

Pork,heart.description: Pork heart is the heart of a pig. It is a good source of protein and iron. Pork hearts are often cooked and served as a main course. They are typically braised or stewed until tender.

Pork,jowl.description: Pork jowl is a fatty cut of meat that comes from the cheek of a pig. It is often used for making bacon or sausage. Pork jowl is known for its rich flavor and its high fat content.

Pork,kidney.description: Pork kidney is the kidney of a pig. It is a good source of protein and iron. Pork kidneys are often cooked and served as a main course. They are typically braised or stewed until tender.

Pork,leaf fat.description: Pork leaf fat is a type of fat that is found in the belly of a pig. It is often used for making bacon or sausage. Pork leaf fat is known for its rich flavor and its high fat content.

Pork,liver.description: Pork liver is the liver of a pig. It is a good source of protein, iron, and vitamin A. Pork livers are often cooked and served as a main course. They are typically braised or stewed until tender.

Pork,lungs.description: Pork lungs are the lungs of a pig. They are often cooked and served as a snack or appetizer. Pork lungs are a good source of protein and collagen. They are typically fried or braised until tender.

Pork,mechanically separated.description: Mechanically separated pork is a type of processed pork that has been mechanically separated from the bone. It is often used as a filler in processed foods, such as sausages and nuggets. Mechanically separated pork is high in fat and cholesterol, so it should be consumed in moderation.

Pork,pancreas.description: Pork pancreas is the pancreas of a pig. It is a good source of protein and enzymes. Pork pancreases are often used to make insulin. They are typically processed and used in medical applications.

Pork,spleen.description: Pork spleen is the spleen of a pig. It is a good source of protein and iron. Pork spleens are often cooked and served as a main course. Pork,stomach.description: Pork stomach, also known as tripe, is a type of offal that is often cleaned and cooked. It is a delicacy in some cultures and is often served fried or stewed. Pork,tongue.description: Pork tongue is the tongue of a pig. It is a good source of protein and iron. Pork tongues are often cooked and served as a main course. They are typically braised or stewed until tender.

Pork,cured,back bacon.description: Back bacon is a type of cured pork that comes from the back of the pig. It is typically thicker and leaner than belly bacon and is often smoked. Back bacon is a good source of protein and fat, but it is also high in sodium and saturated fat.

Fish,inconnu.description: Inconnu is a type of fish with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often used in soups, stews, and chowders. Inconnu is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Fish,sauger.description: Sauger is a type of fish with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often grilled, baked, or fried. Sauger is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Fish,eulachon.description: Eulachon is a type of fish that is known for its high oil content. It is often used in soups, stews, and chowders. Eulachon is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Fish,blackfish.description: Blackfish is a type of fish with a firm, white flesh and a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often grilled, baked, or fried. Blackfish is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Fish,sculpin.description: Sculpin is a type of fish with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often used in soups, stews, and chowders. Sculpin is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Fish,steelhead trout.description: Steelhead trout is a type of trout that has a firm, white flesh and a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often grilled, baked, or fried. Steelhead trout is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids. It is known for its silvery skin and its red spots.

Fish,tilapia.description: Tilapia is a type of fish with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often grilled, baked, or fried. Tilapia is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids. It is known for its white, flaky flesh.

Fish,trout,brook.description: Brook trout is a type of trout that has a firm, white flesh and a mild, slightly sweet flavor. It is often grilled, baked, or fried. Brook trout is a good source of protein and omega-3 fatty acids. It is known for its distinctive brown spots and its reddish-orange fins.

Crustaceans,crab.description: Crab is a type of crustacean that is often eaten cooked. It has a sweet, delicate flavor and a crunchy texture. Crab is a good source of protein, iodine, and selenium.

Pancake,plain.description: Plain pancakes are a breakfast staple. They are made from a batter of flour, eggs, milk, and a leavening agent. While a good source of carbohydrates, plain pancakes are relatively low in fiber and other nutrients.

Pancake,buckwheat.description: Buckwheat pancakes are a nutritious alternative to traditional pancakes. Buckwheat is a gluten-free grain that's high in protein and fiber. They have a slightly nutty flavor and are often enjoyed with fresh fruit and maple syrup.

Pancake,whole-wheat.description: Whole-wheat pancakes offer more fiber and nutrients compared to pancakes made from refined white flour. They have a slightly nutty flavor and denser texture. Choosing whole-wheat pancakes can be a healthier option for breakfast.

Grains,amaranth.description: Amaranth is an ancient grain that is gluten-free and packed with nutrients. It's a complete protein, meaning it contains all nine essential amino acids. Amaranth has a slightly nutty flavor and can be cooked into porridge, added to soups, or used in salads.

Grains,arrowroot flour.description: Arrowroot flour is a gluten-free flour made from the root of the arrowroot plant. It's a good source of fiber and is often used as a thickening agent in sauces, gravies, and puddings. Arrowroot flour has a neutral flavor and doesn't create a cloudy appearance in sauces.

Grains,barley,pearled.description: Pearled barley has had its outer bran layer removed, resulting in a quicker cooking time but less fiber. It's still a good source of carbohydrates and some vitamins and minerals. Pearled barley can be added to soups, stews, or used in salads.

Grains,buckwheat.description: Buckwheat is a gluten-free seed that is high in protein, fiber, and minerals like manganese and copper. It has a nutty flavor and can be eaten as porridge, used in pancakes and noodles, or added to salads.

Grains,bulgur.description: Bulgur is a whole grain made from cracked wheat kernels. It's a good source of fiber, protein, and minerals like manganese and iron. Bulgur has a nutty flavor and chewy texture. It's often used in salads, pilafs, and as a stuffing.

Grains,corn.description: Corn is a cereal grain that is a staple food in many parts of the world. It is a good source of carbohydrates and fiber. Corn can be eaten on the cob, used as an ingredient in countless dishes, or processed into products like cornmeal, cornstarch, and corn syrup.

Grains,couscous.description: Couscous is a small pasta made from durum wheat semolina. It's a good source of carbohydrates and has a light, fluffy texture when cooked. Couscous is often used as a side dish or as a base for salads and stews.

Grains,oats.description: Oats are a nutritious whole grain that is high in fiber, particularly soluble fiber, which can help lower cholesterol levels. Oats are also a good source of protein, magnesium, and zinc. They can be enjoyed as oatmeal, used in baked goods, or added to smoothies.

Grains,rice,brown.description: Brown rice is a whole grain that includes the bran, germ, and endosperm. It's a good source of fiber, magnesium, and selenium. Brown rice has a nutty flavor and chewy texture. It can be used in stir-fries, as a side dish, or in salads.

Grains,rice,white.description: White rice has had its bran and germ removed, resulting in a refined grain that is lower in fiber and nutrients compared to brown rice. White rice has a milder flavor and softer texture than brown rice.

Grains,rice bran.description: Rice bran is the outer layer of the rice grain. It is a good source of fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants. Rice bran oil is also a popular cooking oil.

Grains,rye flour.description: Rye flour is made from grinding rye grains. It has a lower gluten content than wheat flour and gives bread a denser texture and a slightly sour flavor. Rye bread is a good source of fiber and is often used in sandwiches and as a side for soups and stews.

Grains,sorghum.description: Sorghum is an ancient grain that is naturally gluten-free and a good source of fiber, protein, and antioxidants. It has a slightly sweet, earthy flavor and can be used in a variety of dishes, including porridge, bread, and salads.

Grains,tapioca,pearl.description: Pearl tapioca is a starch extracted from the cassava root. It is gluten-free and almost entirely composed of carbohydrates.  Pearl tapioca is often used to make pudding, bubble tea, and as a thickening agent.

Grains,triticale.description: Triticale is a hybrid grain that is a cross between wheat and rye.  It has a higher protein content than wheat and a nutty flavor. Triticale flour can be used in bread, pasta, and other baked goods.

Grains,wheat.description: Wheat is a cereal grain that is a staple food for many people around the world. It is a good source of carbohydrates and protein.  Wheat is used to make bread, pasta, noodles, and many other food products.

Grains,wheat bran.description: Wheat bran is the outer layer of the wheat kernel. It is an excellent source of dietary fiber, which is essential for digestive health. Wheat bran can be added to cereals, yogurt, or smoothies to increase fiber intake.

Grains,wheat flour.description: Wheat flour is a powder made from grinding wheat grains. It is a staple ingredient in many baked goods, such as bread, cakes, and pastries. Wheat flour comes in different varieties, including all-purpose flour, bread flour, and cake flour.

Grains,rice,wild.description: Wild rice is not a true rice, but an aquatic grass. It has a nutty, earthy flavor and a chewy texture.  Wild rice is a good source of protein, fiber, and antioxidants.

Grains,hominy.description: Hominy is dried corn that has been treated with an alkali, like limewater. This process makes the corn easier to digest and gives it a distinctive flavor and texture. Hominy is used in dishes like grits, pozole, and tortillas.

Grains,semolina.description: Semolina is a coarse flour made from durum wheat. It's high in protein and gluten, which gives pasta its chewy texture.  Semolina is used to make pasta, couscous, and some types of bread.

Grains,barley,malt.description: Malt is germinated barley that has been dried. During the malting process, enzymes are activated, which break down the starches in the barley into sugars.  Malt is used in brewing beer, making malt vinegar, and as a sweetener in food products.

Grains,millet.description: Millet is a small, round grain that is naturally gluten-free and high in protein, fiber, and antioxidants.  It has a mild, slightly sweet flavor and can be cooked into porridge, used in pilafs, or ground into flour.

Grains,quinoa.description: Quinoa is a gluten-free seed that is a complete protein. It's also a good source of fiber, iron, and magnesium. Quinoa has a slightly nutty flavor and can be cooked and used in a variety of dishes, similar to rice or couscous.

Grains,rye.description: Rye is a cereal grain that is known for its distinctive, slightly sour flavor. It is a good source of fiber and is often used to make bread, such as rye bread. Rye flour is also used in some beers and whiskeys.

Grains,spelt.description: Spelt is an ancient grain that is a type of wheat. It has a slightly sweet, nutty flavor and is a good source of protein and fiber. Spelt flour can be used in bread, pasta, and other baked goods.

Grains,rice,glutinous.description: Glutinous rice, also known as sticky rice, is a type of rice that becomes sticky when cooked. It is often used in Asian cuisine to make dishes like sushi, mochi, and desserts.

Grains,teff.description: Teff is a tiny grain that is naturally gluten-free. It is a good source of fiber, protein, and iron. Teff has a slightly earthy flavor and can be used to make porridge, bread, or added to stews.

Snacks,pretzels,hard,plain.description: Hard pretzels are low in fat and calories, making them a lighter snack option. They're often high in sodium, so mindful consumption is key. Their crunchy texture and salty flavor make them a popular choice for snacking or pairing with dips.

Snacks,trail mix.description: Trail mix is an energy-dense snack that typically combines nuts, seeds, dried fruit, and sometimes chocolate or pretzels. It offers a mix of healthy fats, protein, fiber, and carbohydrates, providing sustained energy. However, portion control is important as calories can add up quickly.

Candied,maraschino cherries.description: Maraschino cherries are cherries that have been preserved in a sugar syrup and dyed bright red. They're very high in sugar and often contain artificial ingredients. They're primarily used as a garnish in cocktails and desserts, adding a touch of sweetness and color.

Candied,cherries.description: Candied cherries are made by cooking cherries in sugar syrup until they're plump and coated in a sugary glaze. While they offer some vitamins and antioxidants from the cherries, they're high in sugar and should be enjoyed in moderation. They're often used in baked goods, desserts, and confections.

Candied,citron.description: Candied citron is made from the rind of the citron fruit, which is candied in sugar syrup. It has a sweet, slightly bitter flavor and chewy texture. Candied citron is often used in fruitcakes, panettone, and other holiday baked goods.

Candied,ginger root.description: Candied ginger is a spicy and sweet treat made by cooking ginger root in sugar syrup. It's known for its digestive benefits and can help soothe nausea. Candied ginger can be enjoyed on its own or used in baked goods and desserts.

Candied,grapefruit peel.description: Candied grapefruit peel is made by candying the peel of grapefruits in sugar syrup. It has a bittersweet flavor and chewy texture. It can be used in baking or enjoyed as a snack. It is a good source of vitamin C.

Candied,lemon peel.description: Candied lemon peel is made by candying the peel of lemons in sugar syrup. It has a tart and sweet flavor and chewy texture. It can be used in baking or enjoyed as a snack. It is a good source of vitamin C.

Candied,orange peel.description: Candied orange peel is made by candying the peel of oranges in sugar syrup. It has a sweet and slightly bitter flavor and chewy texture. It can be used in baking or enjoyed as a snack. It is a good source of vitamin C.

Candied,pineapple.description: Candied pineapple is made by cooking pineapple chunks in sugar syrup. It's a sweet and tangy treat that can be enjoyed on its own or used in desserts and baked goods. While pineapple offers some vitamins and minerals, the candying process increases the sugar content significantly.

Snacks,potato chips.description: Potato chips are thin slices of potato that have been deep-fried or baked until crispy. They're typically high in fat, sodium, and calories, making them an occasional treat. Different flavors and varieties offer a wide range of taste options.

Grains,arrowroot.description: Arrowroot is a gluten-free starch extracted from the roots of the arrowroot plant. It's a versatile ingredient used as a thickening agent in sauces, soups, and puddings. Arrowroot is easy to digest and has a neutral flavor.

Pasta,macaroni (elbow).description: Elbow macaroni is a type of pasta shaped like narrow, curved tubes. It's a versatile pasta shape that's often used in macaroni and cheese, pasta salads, and soups. The nutritional content of elbow macaroni varies depending on whether it's made with refined or whole-wheat flour.

Pasta,macaroni (elbow),enriched.description: Enriched elbow macaroni is made from refined wheat flour that has been fortified with iron and certain B vitamins. While it offers some added nutrients, it's still lower in fiber compared to whole-wheat macaroni.

Pasta,egg noodles,enriched.description: Enriched egg noodles are made with eggs and refined wheat flour that has been enriched with iron and B vitamins. They have a richer flavor and firmer texture compared to regular pasta. Like other refined grains, they are lower in fiber.

Pasta,spaghetti,enriched.description: Enriched spaghetti is a long, thin pasta made from refined wheat flour that has been enriched with iron and B vitamins. It's a popular pasta shape used in a wide variety of dishes. Enriched spaghetti provides a good source of energy but is lower in fiber.

Pasta,spaghetti,whole-wheat.description: Whole-wheat spaghetti is made from whole durum wheat flour, retaining the bran and germ, which provide fiber, vitamins, and minerals. It has a nuttier flavor and chewier texture compared to refined spaghetti. Whole-wheat spaghetti is a healthier option as it aids digestion and promotes satiety.

Pasta,fresh-refrigerated,plain.description: Fresh pasta is typically made with eggs and flour, resulting in a delicate texture and richer flavor. It cooks faster than dried pasta and is often used in dishes where a lighter texture is desired.

Pasta,fresh-refrigerated,spinach.description: Spinach pasta is a type of fresh pasta that incorporates spinach into the dough, giving it a vibrant green color and a subtle spinach flavor. It's a fun and nutritious way to add more vegetables to your diet.

Pasta,macaroni (elbow),whole wheat.description: Whole-wheat elbow macaroni is made from whole durum wheat flour, providing more fiber, vitamins, and minerals compared to refined elbow macaroni. It has a nuttier flavor and firmer texture. Whole-wheat macaroni is a good source of complex carbohydrates and promotes digestive health.

Pasta,macaroni (elbow),unenriched.description: Unenriched elbow macaroni is made from refined wheat flour that has not been fortified with additional nutrients. It's a good source of carbohydrates but lower in fiber, vitamins, and minerals compared to enriched or whole-wheat options.

Pasta,egg noodles,unenriched.description: Unenriched egg noodles are made with eggs and refined wheat flour that has not been fortified with additional nutrients. They have a richer flavor and firmer texture than regular pasta but are lower in fiber, vitamins, and minerals compared to enriched or whole-wheat options.

Pasta,spaghetti,unenriched.description: Unenriched spaghetti is made from refined wheat flour that has not been fortified with additional nutrients. It is a good source of carbohydrates but is lower in fiber, vitamins, and minerals compared to enriched or whole-wheat options.

Grains,wheat flour,white.description: White wheat flour is a common type of flour that's made from refined wheat grains. It has a fine texture and neutral flavor, making it suitable for a wide range of baking applications. However, the refining process removes some of the bran and germ, resulting in a lower fiber content compared to whole-wheat flour.

Seeds,flaxseed.description: Flaxseeds are small, nutrient-rich seeds that are high in fiber, omega-3 fatty acids, and lignans. They have a slightly nutty flavor and can be eaten whole, ground, or pressed for their oil. Flaxseeds are often added to cereals, yogurt, baked goods, or smoothies to boost their nutritional value.

Egg,dried.description: Dried eggs are made from fresh eggs that have been pasteurized and then dried to remove moisture. They have a long shelf life and can be reconstituted with water when needed. Dried eggs are commonly used in baking and other food manufacturing processes.

Duck,young duckling.description: Duckling is a rich and flavorful meat that's higher in fat and calories compared to chicken or turkey. It's a good source of protein, iron, and B vitamins. Duckling can be roasted, grilled, or pan-fried and is often served with fruity sauces.

Deli-meat,chicken breast.description: Chicken breast deli meat is a lean protein source that's made from cooked chicken breasts that have been seasoned and sliced. It's often lower in fat and calories compared to other deli meats. However, it can be high in sodium, so it's essential to choose low-sodium varieties.

Mangosteen.description: Mangosteen is a tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor. It's rich in antioxidants and has a creamy texture. Mangosteen is often eaten fresh or used in desserts and beverages.

Durian.description: Durian is a unique tropical fruit known for its pungent aroma and custard-like texture. It's high in fiber, potassium, and vitamin C. Durian is often eaten fresh or used in Southeast Asian desserts.

Cucumber,peeled.description: Cucumbers are low in calories and a refreshing source of hydration. They contain antioxidants and have a mild, slightly sweet flavor. Peeled cucumbers are often used in salads, sandwiches, or as a garnish.

Tomato,yellow.description: Yellow tomatoes are similar in flavor to red tomatoes but have a milder, slightly sweeter taste. They're a good source of vitamins A and C. Yellow tomatoes can be eaten fresh, cooked, or used in sauces and salsas.

Arrowroot.description: Arrowroot is a gluten-free starch extracted from the roots of the arrowroot plant. It has a neutral flavor and is easily digestible. Arrowroot is commonly used as a thickening agent in sauces, soups, and puddings.

Lemon grass.description: Lemon grass is a herb with a citrusy aroma and flavor. It's commonly used in Southeast Asian cuisine, adding a refreshing flavor to soups, curries, and stir-fries.

Grape leaves.description: Grape leaves are large, edible leaves that are often used in Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisine. They have a slightly tart flavor and are often stuffed with rice, meat, or vegetables and rolled into dolmas.

Pepper,banana.description: Banana peppers are a type of sweet pepper with a mild, tangy flavor. They range in color from yellow to orange to red. Banana peppers can be eaten raw, grilled, pickled, or used in salads and sandwiches.

Pepper,serrano.description: Serrano peppers are small, green chili peppers with a moderate to hot level of spiciness. They're commonly used in Mexican and Southwestern cuisine, adding heat to salsas, sauces, and dishes.

Pepper,ancho.description: Ancho peppers are dried poblano peppers with a mild heat and sweet, raisin-like flavor. They're a staple in Mexican cuisine, used in mole sauces, adobos, and stews.

Pepper,chili,green.description: Green chili peppers encompass a variety of chili peppers that are green in color. Their heat levels can range from mild to extremely hot. Green chili peppers are used in various cuisines, adding spice and flavor to dishes.

Pepper,pasilla.description: Pasilla peppers are dried chilaca peppers with a mild heat and complex, earthy flavor. They're often used in Mexican cuisine, adding depth to sauces, moles, and adobos.

Epazote.description: Epazote is a pungent herb with a strong, musky flavor. It's commonly used in Mexican and Central American cuisine, particularly in bean dishes and stews. Epazote is believed to aid in digestion.

Fireweed.description: Fireweed is a wildflower that produces edible shoots, leaves, and flowers. It has a slightly sweet and peppery flavor. Fireweed shoots can be eaten raw, steamed, or sautéed, while the leaves can be brewed into tea.

Mushroom,oyster.description: Oyster mushrooms are delicate, fan-shaped mushrooms with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. They're often used in stir-fries, soups, and sauces. Oyster mushrooms are a good source of B vitamins and minerals.

Mushroom,straw.description: Straw mushrooms are small, white mushrooms with a slightly sweet and nutty flavor. They're commonly used in Asian cuisine, particularly in stir-fries and soups. Straw mushrooms are a good source of protein and fiber.

Wasabi.description: Wasabi is a pungent root that's often served with sushi and sashimi. It has a strong, spicy flavor that quickly dissipates. Wasabi is known for its antimicrobial properties.

Lentils,pink.description: Pink lentils are split lentils with a mild, slightly peppery flavor. They cook quickly and break down easily, making them ideal for soups, stews, and dips. Pink lentils are a good source of protein, fiber, and iron.

Rambutan.description: Rambutan is a tropical fruit with a sweet and slightly acidic flavor. It has a hairy outer shell that encloses a translucent, juicy fruit. Rambutan is a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants.

Prune puree.description: Prune puree is made from cooked and pureed prunes. It has a sweet, slightly tart flavor and a smooth texture. Prune puree is a good source of fiber and often used as a natural sweetener or a constipation remedy.

Tomato,orange.description: Orange tomatoes come in a variety of shapes and sizes and have a sweet, tangy flavor. They're high in vitamins A and C. Orange tomatoes can be eaten fresh, cooked, or used in sauces and salsas.

Chrysanthemum leaves.description: Chrysanthemum leaves, also known as shungiku, are edible greens with a slightly bitter and pungent flavor. They're commonly used in Japanese cuisine, often added to soups, hot pots, and as a garnish.

Cabbage,napa.description: Napa cabbage is an oblong-shaped cabbage with tender, mild-flavored leaves. It's commonly used in Asian cuisine, particularly in stir-fries, kimchi, and salads.

Malabar spinach.description: Malabar spinach is a leafy green vegetable that thrives in warm climates. It has a mild flavor and a slightly slimy texture when cooked. Malabar spinach is a good source of vitamins A and C.

Mushroom,cloud ears.description: Cloud ear mushrooms, also known as wood ear mushrooms, have a crunchy texture and a mild, slightly sweet flavor. They're commonly used in Chinese cuisine, often added to soups, stir-fries, and dumplings.

Yautia.description: Yautia, also known as malanga, is a starchy root vegetable with a mild flavor. It can be boiled, fried, or mashed. Yautia is a good source of carbohydrates and fiber.

Chickpea flour.description: Chickpea flour, also known as gram flour or besan, is made from ground chickpeas. It's a gluten-free flour with a nutty flavor. Chickpea flour is used in a variety of dishes, including socca, pakoras, and hummus.

Capers.description: Capers are unripe flower buds that have been pickled and are known for their pungent, salty, and slightly lemony flavor. They are used as a condiment or garnish in Mediterranean cuisine, often added to pasta dishes, salads, and sauces.

Horseradish.description: Horseradish is a root vegetable known for its pungent and spicy flavor. It's often used as a condiment, adding a kick to sauces, dips, and sandwiches.

Cracker,cheese.description: Cheese crackers are savory snacks made from flour, cheese, and other seasonings. They can be high in sodium and fat, so moderation is key. Different brands and varieties offer a range of flavors and textures.

Nuts,macadamia,dry roasted.description: Macadamia nuts are buttery, rich nuts that are high in healthy fats, particularly monounsaturated fats. Dry roasted macadamia nuts have a crunchy texture and intense flavor. They're a good source of vitamins and minerals but should be consumed in moderation due to their calorie density.

Carbonated drinks,cola,decaffeinated.description: Decaffeinated cola drinks are similar in flavor to regular cola but without the caffeine. However, they're still high in sugar and often contain artificial sweeteners, colors, and flavors. It's best to consume them in moderation or opt for healthier beverage choices.

Coffee,brewed,decaffeinated.description: Decaf coffee is made from coffee beans that have had most of the caffeine removed. It offers a similar flavor profile to regular coffee but without the stimulating effects of caffeine. Decaf coffee still contains antioxidants but in lower amounts than regular coffee.

Tea,brewed,decaffeinated.description: Decaffeinated tea is made from tea leaves that have had most of the caffeine removed. It offers a similar flavor profile to regular tea but without the stimulating effects of caffeine. Decaf tea still contains antioxidants but in lower amounts than regular tea.

Beef,ground,extra lean.description: Extra lean ground beef is a good source of protein and iron. It has a lower fat content compared to regular ground beef, making it a healthier option for ground beef dishes.

Sauce,nacho cheese.description: Nacho cheese sauce is a creamy, cheesy sauce that's typically made with cheese, milk, and seasonings. It's often high in calories, fat, and sodium. It's best enjoyed as an occasional treat.

Deli-meat,turkey breast.description: Turkey breast deli meat is a lean protein source made from cooked turkey breast that has been seasoned and sliced. It's generally lower in fat and calories compared to other deli meats. However, it can be high in sodium, so choosing low-sodium varieties is essential.

Cereal,ready-to-eat,chex.description: Chex cereal is a popular breakfast cereal that comes in various flavors. It's often fortified with vitamins and minerals. However, some varieties can be high in sugar, so it's essential to choose lower-sugar options or consume them in moderation.

Cereal,ready-to-eat,nesquik.description: Nesquik cereal is a chocolate-flavored breakfast cereal that's popular among children. While it's fortified with vitamins and minerals, it's also high in sugar. It's best enjoyed as an occasional treat or in moderation.

Cereal,hot,oats,instant.description: Instant oats are a quick and convenient breakfast option made from rolled oats that have been pre-cooked and dried. They're a good source of fiber and can be prepared with water or milk. However, some flavored varieties can be high in sugar, so it's essential to choose plain options or add your own sweeteners.

Cereal,ready to eat,alpen.description: Alpen cereal is a muesli-style breakfast cereal that typically contains a mix of grains, fruits, nuts, and seeds. It's a good source of fiber and provides a variety of nutrients. However, some varieties can be high in sugar, so choosing lower-sugar options is essential.

Cereal,ready-to-eat,grainshop.description: Grainshop cereal is a brand of breakfast cereal that offers a variety of flavors and grain combinations.
